name: KnightMare (itch) (Dvergr)
description:
This is the first level of a plateformer 2D.

You are a knight and for now, you must find the entrance of the Castle.

Use de directional arrows to moove, the space bar to jump and the right control button to use your sword against ennemies.

Here is a link below to a little playtest survey.

If you want to complete it correcly, you will be asked :

  •  how many times have you died
  • how much life you had left when you succesfully completed the level
  • how long did it take you to finish the level

https://forms.gle/cBwz5zhgteRo2HiHA
